text: Fix issue #86 as described by ib-lundgren's comment.  This adds `nonce` and `timestamp` arguments to the Client constructor and uses them in .get_oauth_params() if given.  I even added tests and fixed another typo. :)
title: Issue86

text: Fix issue #86 as described by ib-lundgren's comment.  This adds `nonce` and `timestamp` arguments to the Client constructor and uses them in .get_oauth_params() if given.  I even added tests and fixed another typo. :)
title: Issue86
Pull request merge from warsaw/oauthlib:issue86 to idan/oauthlib:master

text: Fix a typo in the code that converts arguments from bytes to unicodes.

Fix issue #86 by adding `nonce` and `timestamp` arguments to Client
constructor.  In get_oauth_params(), use the explicitly provided nonce and
timestamp if given, otherwise generate them.
